Get Started now

At the end of the Graphics course

  • You will have a deep understanding of elements & principles of design, typography, color theory, photos and other design theory and skills.
  • Master the curvature tool, shape builder tool and other essential vector design tools in Adobe Illustrator.
  • Create logos and branding packages for potential clients in Adobe Illustrator.
  • Master Image composite, photo editing and manipulation in Adobe Photoshop.
  • Understand and learn the essential tools and capabilities of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and Corel Draw.
  • Work through a flyer design to understand strong type hierarchy, balance and overall design layout in Illustrator, Photoshop and Corel Draw.

At the end of the Motion Graphics Course

  • You will be comfortable with After Effects CC, starting a new composition, using the basic tools .
  • You will have a deep understanding working in the After Effects CC timeline.
  • Animating position, scale, rotation, and opacity, working with text & shape layers and masks.
  • Real world projects such as lower thirds and bumpers.
  • Using video effects and presets to speed up workflow
  • Motion graphics principles and best practices & Green screen and chromakey removal.
  • Creating unique transitions, motion tracking and video stabilization.
  • Visual effects and rotoscoping, exporting your projects and so much more!
